sentences.en: A few fertilizer can be added appropriately in matrix.
sentences.cn: 基质中可适当添加一些肥料.

sentences.en: A winner's timing is right. Winners respond appropriately to the situation.
sentences.cn: 赢家擅于审时度势, 对形势做出恰当的反应.

sentences.en: All products are appropriately identified before being sent to customers.
sentences.cn: 送交顾客前所有产品都须经确认.

sentences.en: Always use video appropriately and your online learners will be much happier.
sentences.cn: 多而适当地运用视频会使网络初学者们感到高兴.

sentences.en: And Julie married Alec, dressed appropriately in virginal white.
sentences.cn: 朱莉穿着一件与此场合相称的纯白婚纱嫁给了亚历克。

sentences.en: Appropriately, the press rode him hard.
sentences.cn: 新闻界对此严加批评是恰当的.

sentences.en: Controls must be used appropriately and judiciously, like all elements of a good user interface.
sentences.cn: 就像所有好的界面元素一样, 控件的使用也必须是恰当且合理的.

sentences.en: Do we have any means to align our research appropriately with our understanding of those risks?
sentences.cn: 我们是否有可能根据对这些风险的理解来适当地调整我们的研究方向呢？

sentences.en: For the interview itself you should dress smartly and appropriately.
sentences.cn: 在面试时,你应该穿着得体适当.

sentences.en: He has good taste in clothing; he always dresses appropriately.
sentences.cn: 他对衣著很有品味, 他总是穿著得体.

sentences.en: Her singing of " Evening Waltz " was easy and lively, well - balanced and appropriately controlled in volume.
sentences.cn: 她唱的 “ 晚会圆舞曲 ” 轻松愉快, 层次分明,音量的控制也恰到好处.

sentences.en: Incorporate figures , tables, and equations appropriately into the text.
sentences.cn: 请在正文中适当加入图表和方程式.

sentences.en: Now respond appropriately to the calls Role A will make to you.
sentences.cn: 现在,恰当地回复角色A给你打来的电话.

sentences.en: The above problems were improved appropriately and some effects were achieved.
sentences.cn: 针对以上问题做了相应改进,取得了一定效果.

sentences.en: The BOH area is only accessible to appropriately accredited people.
sentences.cn: 只有持有相应证件的人员才可以进入工作区.

sentences.en: The victims of a crime are demanding the perpetrator be dealt with appropriately.
sentences.cn: 这种犯罪行为的受害者却是遵纪守法的良民.

sentences.en: Try to dress appropriately for each occasion.
sentences.cn: 试图为每个场合适当地打扮。
